title: 1 Year after permanent ban
body: I'v grown up & i just am wondering if i still can get a chance to play on my banned account.

replies.body:
Unfortunately, they do not unban accounts unless they were banned in error. 

If you feel you were punished in error, you can write a support ticket.
you are completely wrong, mine was perma banned and i got the ban lifted, how are you a moderator and not know this?

I’m actually familiar with your history. I don’t believe you ever explained the nature of you being unbanned. 

Was it part of the experiment? Or was there an error?
i just asked for a second chance since my past games were very good, i had a good history of good behavior.

I think I remember you saying that, actually.

It still *felt* like it was in error, but I don't know your whole history, so I'd let you be the judge of that. 

Further, that statement is from a Rioter that frequents the PB forums, so if I hear more players being unbanned, then I'd change my statement.

well it's a case by case basis, reason why i placed a ticket was because i had a long reformed record, and a few bad days got me the perma, i think the rioters had good judgement and i havent been toxic since... i do have a new issue going on but that's why i placed another ticket.

> [{quoted}](name=One Inch Of Joy,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=74dycTKb,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-01-25T09:02:19.686+0000)
>
> tyler1

What about him? Are you suggesting one of his accounts were unbanned? Please tell us which one, because apparently you know something that everyone else doesnt.

~~REEEEEEEEEE~~

None of his accounts were unbanned.
There should be EU unban too as well as NA already had one!
it's cool man noones perfect, create a ticket
Permanent ban is as the name suggests, permanent. The answer is no.
Spamming every thread will do nothing.
